english.segment1: Jesus is lord of all, jesus is lord of all, No sin is too big, no problem too small, Jesus is lord of all.
english.segment2: Jesus is king of kings, my lord is king of kings, Presidents, princes, paupers will sing, Jesus is king of kings.
english.segment3: Jesus christ is lord of all, King of king of kings and lord of lords. You know he's lord of all.
english.segment4: Jesus is coming soon, jesus is coming soon. Just look in your heart and see if there's room. Cause jesus is coming soon.
english.segment5: Jesus christ is lord of all, yes, yes, yes. King of kings and lord of lords. That's all, there is, that all. My God is lord of all.
english.segment6: Jesus is lord of all, jesus is lord of all, No sin is too big, no problem too small, Jesus is lord of all.
